component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands: Configure a standard access list named PERMIT-ADMIN on R1 to permit only the 192.168.1.0/24 network. Exit from ACL configuration to continue.

command.instruction: <font face="_sans"><b>Using the snmp-server view command, configure an SNMP view named SNMP-RO to include the entire ISO tree from the MIB.</font>

<font face="_sans"><b>Using the snmp-server group command, configure an SNMP group with the name ADMIN. Set SNMP to version 3 with authentication and encryption required. Allow read-only access to the view SNMP-RO, and limit access using the PERMIT-ADMIN ACL.</font>

command.correctresponse: snmp-server group ADMIN v3 priv read SNMP-RO access PERMIT-ADMIN
command.instruction: <font face="_sans"><b>Using the snmp-server user command, add an snmp user named BOB as a member of the ADMIN group. Set SNMP to version 3 and set authentication to use SHA with a password of cisco12345. Set the encryption to AES 128 with a password of cisco54321. After configuration is complete, use the end command to exit configuration mode.</font>

command.correctresponse: snmp-server user BOB ADMIN v3 auth sha cisco12345 priv aes 128 cisco54321

command.instruction: <font face="_sans"><b>You successfully configured SNMPv3 authentication using an ACL on R1.</font>
